There are a couple of bugs in RasterPropMonitor due to the new KSP release.  I am working on an update to RPM.
Mk.

Hey! I play with your mods for some times and I only play IVA for my manned mission, but I can't find THE switch I need ^^ I'm looking for the switch between Orbit/Surface/Target for the Navball.  

I found it in the ALCOR module, but not in the Mk1-2 pod. And as I use the Mk1-2 pod for reentry targetting the retrograde in surface navball, it maybe vital for some kerbal coming home ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")  

Does anyone know where it is, if there is one? If not, I propose you to instal it because it's really nice to use more and more switchs!!!  

I currently use the version 0.2 of this mod because my game is in 1.2.2 (and <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> for compatibility between mods).  

Thanks for your help, and sorry for my english cause I'm a Baguette kerbonaute ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

> 
>

> 

The "switch" is on the display with X button with Select Mode. 

![0pvTr8N.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/0pvTr8N.jpg)

Hi, i'm new to the forum but have been playing KSP since 2013, and within the last year your mods as well! I'm very interested in trying all the new IVA's. Since i'm new to the forum i can't PM you. is there a way to proceed from here or will I have to wait until you fully release the mod? 

Thanks,

Rocky 

**Edited <time datetime="2017-08-19T15:14:53Z" title="08/19/2017 03:14  PM" data-short="6 yr">August 19, 2017</time> by RockyButtclench**

[@alexustas](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/78632-alexustas/)     

Might I ask how you are modifying IVAs ? are you using the Part Tools to import the stock files into Unity or are you doing something different entirely? Because I have problems importing existing IVAs into Unity to change them or modify them to my own needs, like with ASET props and RPM screens.  

So if you have a little tip or something like that, it would be really appriciated! I love flying planes and IVAs and being able to raise the quality of some cockpits would be really nice ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

> 
> 
> 16 hours ago, CItyrobo said:
> 
> 
> are you using the Part Tools to import the stock files into Unity
> 

Yes, I'm using PartTools to import Internal

[@CItyrobo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/181251-cityrobo/)

I made for you quick video about how to edit a stock interior

>

> also now I am sure that all those errors I was getting in Unity are somewhat normal (textures, probs ).  
>   
> 
> that makes me ask though: Are the seat\_pilot , StorageBagA and B and some of the PlaneHatches and stuff also not loading correctly into Unity for you? because that's the reason I have to basically copy those props from the stock config, delete them in Unity, and after I write to the config I have to paste them back into the config so they aren't missing from the finished IVA.  
>   
> 
> do you have a better way of solving that issue or is it a known problem?

Hi ! Is the development still active?  

Keep the good stuff coming, amazing work! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

**UPDATE!**

**'MK1-2' IVA REPLACEMENT BY ASET**  v0.3

- All switches changed to new modular ones.
- Revised instrument layout.
- Greatly extended MechJeb support.
- Added CommNet, Astrogator, Kerbalism, <abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)">USI</abbr>-LS and Chatterer support .
- Added the ability to switch to window view by double-clicking on the window.
- Small UV and texture changes.

Wow, , I got mentioned in every release thread! Thanks [@alexustas](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/78632-alexustas/)! I am glad to help! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
R.I.P. Me. I cant find a 1.2 version link. Ill try to see if the 1.3 version works for me. Anyways, looks like an awesome mod.

The props seem to work fine

Sorry, don't get me wrong, but you are saying that if I install everything from 1.3.1 to 1.4.1 it will work, except RPM? I'm still on 1.3.1 just because of the your greatest ASET's

to be correct, the RPM is updated and works in 1.4.1  but it has a couple of [glitches](https://github.com/Mihara/RasterPropMonitor/issues/659)that do not allow me to officially announce that my IVAs work well in 1.4.1
